# Data processing 

Create date columns: year, month, and date (ymd)

```{python}
labour = (
    labour.with_columns(
        pl.col('REF_DATE').str.extract(r'^(\d+)').cast(pl.Int32).alias('YEAR'),
        pl.col('REF_DATE').str.extract(r'(\d+)$').cast(pl.Int32).alias('MONTH')
    )
    .with_columns(
        pl.date(pl.col('YEAR'), pl.col('MONTH'), 1).alias('DATE_YMD')
    )
    .sort(['DATE_YMD'])
)
```


Filter to post 2005

```{python}
labour.group_by('YEAR').len().sort('YEAR')
```

```{python}
labour_filt = labour.filter(pl.col('YEAR') >= 2005)
labour_filt.group_by('YEAR').len().sort('YEAR')
```


```{python}
labour_filt.group_by('Labour force characteristics').len()

```
